actionConfiguration.body:
WITH
ins_trip_revenue_collection_log AS (
    INSERT INTO
        trip_revenue_collection_log (
            fleet_tracking_id, trip_revenue_collection_id, user_id, user_data, status
        )
    VALUES
        {{dateCollectionTbl.selectedRows.map((a)=>"('" + 
						a.fleet_tracking_id+"',"+
						a.trip_revenue_collection_id+","+
						appsmith.store.user_id+",'"+
						appsmith.store.user_data+"','"+
						'settled'+
						"')").join()}}
	RETURNING trip_revenue_collection_id
),
trip_revenue_collection_status_update as (UPDATE trip_revenue_collection_status
    SET
        status = 'settled', updated_at=now()
    where 
        id in ({{dateCollectionTbl.selectedRows.map((a)=>a.id).join()}})
																				 RETURNING trip_revenue_collection_id)
																				 
select * from ins_trip_revenue_collection_log
join trip_revenue_collection_status_update
on ins_trip_revenue_collection_log.trip_revenue_collection_id=trip_revenue_collection_status_update.trip_revenue_collection_id
